mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NFC_Temperature_Data ( Uid, GoodsName, DateRecordTime, MaxTemperature, MinTemperature, Temperature, TempStatus, Hum, MaxHum, MinHum, HumStatus )VALUES( #{Uid}, #{GoodsName}, #{DateTime}, #{MaxTemperature}, #{MinTemperature}, #{Temperature}, #{Status}, #{Hum}, #{MaxHum}, #{MinHum}, #{HumStatus})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT * FROM NFC_Temperature_Data WHERE Uid=#{uid} AND DateRecordTime BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ORDER BY DateRecordTime DESC
SELECT * FROM NFC_Temperature_Data WHERE Uid=#{id} ORDER BY DateRecordTime DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT count(*) FROM NFC_Temperature_Data WHERE Uid = #{uid} AND DateRecordTime BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
